Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2018 03:24PM rgail007 wrote: I have been finding radiation more emotionally/psychologically difficult than chemo was. Am I the only one? Maybe because the chemo worked well and I had a mastectomy and there's nothing left, but this is still happening. i know it's for potential microscopic stuff, but it's just been harder, for me so far, to mentally overcome the challenge. I'm 6 treatments into 30 so not a lot of physical trouble yet (hopefully it won't ever come to that), but I feel near tears every time I lay down on that table.
Posts.Title: JULY 2018 Radiation? jerseymom12 Marymc86

Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2018 12:22PM rgail007 wrote: I started today. I am all marked up with sharpie marks and little clear stickers. I don't like the stickers as they will interfere with aloe or other moisturizer. I would almost rather have little dot tattoos!
